title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sustainable and cost-efficient generative AI with agentic workflows (AIM333)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能体工作流实现可持续且经济高效的生成式人工智能 (AIM333)
abstract: Building sustainable, cost-effective generative AI on AWS requires integrating agentic AI, efficient architecture, and cloud-native optimization. Agentic systems using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore employ contextual memory, asynchronous execution, and on-demand tool invocation to minimize compute waste. MCP enables secure connections between AI agents, AWS services, and custom tools. Efficiency increases through AWS's Trainium and Inferentia2 silicon (50% better performance per watt), Amazon SageMaker for scalable development, and optimization techniques like quantization and speculative decoding. Auto-scaling, batch processing, and spot instances prevent over-provisioning. Combined with CloudWatch and Cost Explorer monitoring, this approach delivers high-performance, low-carbon generative AI solutions.
abstract_cn: 在AWS上构建可持续、经济高效的生成式AI需要整合智能体AI、高效架构和云原生优化。使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore的智能体系统采用上下文记忆、异步执行和按需工具调用来最小化计算浪费。MCP实现AI智能体、AWS服务和自定义工具之间的安全连接。通过AWS的Trainium和Inferentia2芯片（每瓦性能提升50%）、用于可扩展开发的Amazon SageMaker，以及量化和推测解码等优化技术来提高效率。自动扩展、批处理和竞价实例可防止过度配置。结合CloudWatch和Cost Explorer监控，这种方法可提供高性能、低碳的生成式AI解决方案。
